title: Massive Medieval Battle: Struggle Between 8 Armies - Medieval Kingdoms Total War 1212AD Mod Gameplay
description:
BATTLE STARTS: 6:30
8 medieval armies meet on the battlefield.  A total of about 15,000+ troops are about to fight in a bloody conflict.  But only one team will be left standing!  Enjoy the epic battle :D

Medieval Kingdoms Total War 1212ad is a mod for Total War: Attila!

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
